name: Visit Paris By Segway
description:
Visit Paris and fill up sensations !
More Original and fun than the « Bateau Mouches », the sightseeing Buses or Rickshaws ! Dare an unusual visit of Paris with Segway PT, Electric Scooters or Bicycle.

Share a unique and unforgettable moment during an atypical stroll in the heart of Paris.

Take advantage of a young and dynamic team, clear and humored explanations and conviviality.

Discover the city as you have never seen it.
